programme.desc: Station 42 responds to a dangerous fire at a beloved local smokehouse where Jake is forced to confront memories of his late father and the place they once shared.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Sandokan decides to free Marianne and journeys to Sarawak to find his real parents. Sandokan and Marianne are captured by a rogue Dayak tribe, which happens to be Sani’s. Yanez and crew are also caught while tracking Sandokan. Forced to fight a cobra to prove his Dayak heritage, Sandokan is poisoned but survives, gaining the tribe’s acceptance. Meanwhile, Brooke and Murray defy orders and follow Sandokan’s trail.

programme.title: Sandokan: The Pirate Prince
programme.desc: Believing him to be the prophesied leader, the tribe’s chief, Balau, helps Sandokan uncover his past, despite his son Lang’s jealousy. As Sandokan makes progress, he and Marianne confess their love for each other. Yanez argues with Sandokan not to get involved with the Dayak’s struggle and leaves. Sandokan discovers his tribe was massacred under orders from Marianne’s father. The lovers fall out, and Brooke rescues Marianne.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.desc: With over 50 years in the industry, not many filmmakers can boast the longevity and influence of Steven Spielberg, whose journey from the suburbs of Arizona to the spotlight of Hollywood is one of the greatest stories ever told.

programme.title: The Moviemakers

programme.desc: Observe a land filled with geological phenomena whose majesty can only truly be appreciated from the sky. From forgotten shipwrecks strewn along the coastline to the unexplained fairy circles in Koakoveld, Namibia's secrets will be revealed.

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Experience Namibia’s wild 1,000km coast! Where arid deserts meet stubborn life, this film captures a grandiose, fragile spectacle of nature thriving against all odds. Witness the impossible beauty!

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: From the Rockies to the Pacific, British Columbia is a jewel of biodiversity! Roam vast landscapes where the mighty grizzly bear reigns supreme. It’s a majestic, wild world waiting to be preserved!

programme.title: Nature Sanctuaries
programme.desc: Life finds a way! Blown by winds and washed ashore, the Caribbean is now a mesmerizing hotspot of global biodiversity. Explore these fragile, emerald ecosystems and their incredible island resilience.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive and Mary-Ann investigate 34,000 years of Britain’s Gods and Monsters. The intrepid duo hunt for King Arthur, uncover the gates of hell, and decipher some very rude ancient graffiti in search of answers to Britain’s most mystic mysteries.

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Clive Anderson and Mary Ann Ochota explore a mysterious giant hill figure and get drawn into ancient myths, local folklore, and pagan rituals. Who put it there and why?

programme.title: Mystic Britain S2
programme.desc: Were Druids prehistoric hippies or bloodthirsty practitioners of human sacrifice? To find out, Clive Anderson and Mary-Ann Ochota explore Anglesey, consider cannibalism, and face the fiery Wicker Man.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson joins the US Marines' 'Heavy Haulers' squadron as they're put to the test. They battle to keep their fleet of CH53 'Super Stallion' choppers flying, in preparation for intense warfare training exercises in the desert and mountains.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson goes on a cross-country road trip to help the Well Done Foundation. They work to find and cap some of the estimated two million leaking, toxic - potentially deadly abandoned oil and gas wells that are scattered throughout the U.S.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: With a little help from Gabby’s imagination, a sparkly toy banana turns into a magical Rainy Day Banana that helps Gabby and the Gabby Cats have fun on a rainy day! They have silly banana snacks with Cakey, make crafts to tell a story with Baby Box, and have an a-meow-zing banana dance party with DJ Catnip. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Cakey sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Young Ip Man: Crisis Time
programme.desc: Set in 1917, young Ip Man pursues his studies in Hong Kong. The school is held hostage on the day of an English speech competition, and as Ip Man decides to step up and fight the crisis, it is revealed that his master and his childhood friend are behind all this. Can he take them down and uphold justice?

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: A drug cartel is entrenched in the Dong Zhou area. Mei Jing of the Thunderbolt Women’s Commando Unit, leads her team to attack the drug base, but they are being ambushed and the identity of Mei’s father as an undercover is exposed. After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Hua’s hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins And Dives: Triple D Nation (S6)
programme.desc: Guy Fieri digs in diner style with mighty mac 'n cheese in Atlanta, brisket hash in San Antonio and a supreme breakfast burrito in Scottsdale, AZ.

programme.title: Chopped Junior (S8)
programme.desc: Ambitious young chefs put their skills to the test, starting with appetizers featuring Texas toast.

programme.title: Symon's Dinners Cooking Out (S4)
programme.desc: Michael Symon creates a meal that will have the kids running to the table. He makes a dairy-free Tomato Soup with Parm Crisps and crunchy BLT Lettuce Wraps.

programme.title: Symon's Dinners Cooking Out (S4)
programme.desc: In tribute to his grandfather, Michael Symon crowns Pastrami Spiced Pork Chops with Braised Vegetables.

programme.title: Jose Andres & Family In Spain (S1)
programme.desc: In Barcelona, Chef José Andrés and his daughters feast on amazing tapas,cook Spanish surf-and-turf and visit the world-famous El Bulli restaurant.

programme.title: Chopped (S57)
programme.desc: Three more chefs try to topple a fierce returning champion as they take on the wheel's nightmarish ingredients plus a sweet and spicy dessert.

programme.title: Guy's Chance Of A Lifetime (S1)
programme.desc: Guy Fieri introduces the six highly-competitive job candidates, and the arrival of a seventh candidate causes a big upset.

programme.title: Mysteries Unearthed With Danny Trejo (S1)
programme.desc: From a mythical monster that turns out to be real to one of the deadliest prehistoric animals on the planet, these startling discoveries shock and terrify the world.

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII
programme.desc: Racing an incoming hurricane, Darrell Miklos and his team are forced to make tough choices. But after a season-long search, they locate the source of the massive magnetometer hit recorded at Target 4.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S1)
programme.desc: Relics from the crucifixion of Jesus Christ have fascinated the faithful for 2000 years—from the wooden cross and iron nails to the crown of thorns. But do these sacred artefacts still exist?

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: As the team begins drilling in search of a metal object buried in the Mesa, they also perform a new experiment at the Triangle that causes startling UFOs to appear on Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: Troy runs into big trouble in his favourite honey hole. Daniel chases a legendary gator known as The Pirate. Leron and Porkchop battle a voodoo curse and confront a zombie gator.

programme.title: Hidden Cities (S2)
programme.desc: We journey deep into the rugged geography of this legendary Indonesian island and come face to face with a cannibalistic tribe - the Bataks.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: While a trip to Europe continues to uncover clues connecting the Templars to Scandinavian culture and Oak Island, on Oak Island, a clue found beneath a Nolan's Cross boulder may offer the missing answers.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)
programme.desc: The team dives in search of an A3 Skywarrior attack aircraft that was lost in a suspicious disaster off the USS Saratoga aircraft carrier in 1960. The Saratoga lost eight men on this single mission.

programme.title: Secrets Declassified With David Duchovny (S1)
programme.desc: They say better the devil you know, but what happens when you have to hold hands with him? When governments strike deals with cults, mobs, and even enemies, frosty relationships are tested head-on.

programme.title: Dugong Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Father and son were unknowingly pitted against each other in this tale of a man determined to hate his enemy all his life and who, one day, would exact revenge in the most cruel manner even if it took him years and years of plotting and waiting.

programme.title: Ang Boyfriend Kong Gamol (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Alice Dixson plays a rich woman who returns in the country with a plan to reach out to the poor and stop poverty. She decides to disguise herself so she can penetrate the poor community and in the process she meets Andrew E and falls in love with him despite their social differences.

programme.title: Abrakadabra
programme.desc: Dolphy is a poor man who finds a jar which turns out to be the home of a genie (Jimmy Santos).

programme.title: Hanggang Ngayo'y Ika'y Minamahal
programme.desc: She loves her husband despite his irresponsible ways.She continues to stand by him despite his flaws.

programme.title: Sgt. Ernesto Baliola: Tinik Sa Batas
programme.desc: Sgt. Ernesto Baliola: Tinik Sa Batas

programme.title: Ultimatum
programme.desc: Dina played a Filipina working with a US-based chemical company. Eddie played the Chief of Police assigned to protect the chemical company visiting group which fell victim to a terrorist gang. Eddie was only too obsessed to save the company because Dina happened to be his girlfriend.

programme.title: Silang Mga Sisiw Sa Lansangan
programme.desc: Four kids stow away from home and became streetchildren. A philantrophist adopted them and treated them as his family until they were held hostages. The kidnapping became news headline which eventually made their parents to know their where-abouts.

programme.title: Chick Boy
programme.desc: Stars in this comedy about university students living in the fast lane though they cannot afford to. They find work as helpers to a rich woman with three beautiful nieces. Of course they turn on the charm for the girls and their aunt.

programme.title: Sana Bukas Pa Ang Kahapon (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Three friends made their way in the big city. In the end they all thought of the things they should never have done, wondering what might have been had these tomorrows been their yesterdays.

programme.title: Maging Sino Ka Man (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Together in a remote barrio, Sharon and Robin discovered love and the children found themselves a home. But first they must settle the matter of her money-hungry relatives and Robin must learn to accept Sharon's real self.

programme.title: Carding Estrabel: Tirador Ng Malabon
programme.desc: One of the heroes that emerged during the Japanese occupation was the soldier-killer Carding (Dante Varona). After the war, Carding became a policeman and as such, continued his work of ridding the force of its corrupt elements.

programme.title: Bruce Liit
programme.desc: Bruce (Niño Muhlach) is eager to learn karate specially when he sees his father practice. But Miguel (Ramon Zamora) keeps on postponing his son's instruction deeming Bruce too young to appreciate the principles behind this particular vocation.

programme.title: Urban Rangers
programme.desc: Urban warfare could be as dangerous as being in a battle zone. This was discovered by a group of young idealistic new graduates from the police academy who were unjustly sent to prison because they refused to condone the corruption in the force.

programme.desc: John Nolan, the oldest rookie in the LAPD, has used his life experience, determination and sense of humor to keep up with rookies 20 years his junior. Nearing the end of his training, Nolan now faces his biggest challenge as a police officer when he must come to terms with the choices he has made in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: JJ's Ultimate Pretend Play Day!
programme.desc: It's JJ's ultimate pretend play day! He becomes a detective, a brave knight & the captain of a pirate ship!

programme.title: JJ's Yummy Food & Clean-Up Fun!
programme.desc: JJ has yummy food & clean-up fun! He makes pasta with Grandma, eats healthy fruit & gives Bingo a bath!

programme.title: Relaxing Sounds for Babies
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum is here to help you fall to sleep; with soothing, relaxing animated lullabies

programme.title: Creative Farm Adventures!
programme.desc: It's a creative farm adventure! Ella brings school to the barn, makes delicious jam & does some stargazing!

programme.title: Healthy Habits & Happy You!
programme.desc: Learn healthy habits on the farm! Ella learns to wash her hands, eat veggies & how to recycle!

programme.title: A Big Day of Rescues & Learning!
programme.desc: It's a big day of rescues! The crew puts out a barn fire, saves a friend from an avalanche & fixes a clock!

programme.title: The Biggest, Craziest Disasters!
programme.desc: The crew faces the biggest disasters! They escape an avalanche & rescue a friend trapped down a hole!

programme.title: Songs About Feeling Good & Staying Safe!
programme.desc: Feel good & stay safe with KiiYii! They learn how to brush their teeth & how to be safe while riding a bike!

programme.title: Cody Is a Good Brother & a Good Friend
programme.desc: Cody is a good brother & friend! He learns he's a big brother & welcomes his new sister Kendi home!

programme.title: A Day of Cody's Favorite Things!
programme.desc: It's a day of Cody's favorite things! He pretends to be a dinosaur, forms a rock band & helps a lost duckling!

programme.title: The Ultimate Clubhouse Game Day
programme.desc: It's game day at the clubhouse! JJ has a go-kart race, plays hide-and-seek & has a balloon boat race!

programme.title: An Adventure, Pedals, Rescue & Stars!
programme.desc: The Minibods go on an adventure! Lulu misses her bunny on a camping trip & Newt learns to ride without pedals!

programme.title: Drawing, Painting, Music & A Quick Fix!
programme.desc: It's a creative day for the Minibods! Newt learns to slow down her drawing & Lulu tries to make a music video!

programme.title: From Waterfalls to Outer Space!
programme.desc: Gecko's on epic adventures, from saving Grandma at a waterfall to launching a spaceship to the moon!

programme.title: The Ultimate Rescue Missions!
programme.desc: Gecko is on the ultimate rescue missions! He saves Eric from a storm & stops a rocket-powered truck!

programme.title: Creative Farm Adventures!
programme.desc: It's a creative farm adventure! Ella brings school to the barn, makes delicious jam & does some stargazing!

programme.title: Big Surprises on the Farm!
programme.desc: There are big surprises on the farm! Ella & Bee find a mysterious tortoise egg & meet new tiger twin friends!

programme.title: A Day in the Life of JJ & Friends!
programme.desc: Spend a day in the life of JJ! He goes on a beach trip, brings Bingo to school & feeds baby animals!

programme.title: Shapes, Songs & Story Time!
programme.desc: Explore letters, sounds & songs with Ms. Appleberry & JJ. Play pretend & see what's inside the Melon Box.

programme.title: JJ's Favorite Classic Sing-Alongs!
programme.desc: JJ sings his favorite classics! He dances to "Head, Shoulders, Knees, and Toes" & plays "Ten in the Bed"!

programme.title: Baby John's Big Book of Safety!
programme.desc: Baby John learns all about safety! He learns to be safe on a bike ride, at the beach & while swimming!

programme.title: What Should I Be When I Grow Up?
programme.desc: What should Baby John be when he grows up? He races an ambulance & learns about Mexican luchador superheroes!

programme.title: Answering Big Questions!
programme.desc: Blippi is answering big questions! He learns how to brush teeth, why we sneeze & how spiders make their webs!

programme.title: From Mail To Outer Space!
programme.desc: Blippi goes on amazing journeys! He follows a letter through the mail & takes a rocket trip to outer space!

programme.title: From Dinosaurs To Pet Knights!
programme.desc: Blippi meets amazing animals! He helps a sauropod stuck in mud & meets a corgi who is a real-life knight!

programme.title: When Arpo's Imagination Runs Wild!
programme.desc: Arpo's imagination runs wild! He thinks he's a pirate, builds a rollercoaster & battles a jelly monster!

programme.title: Mom's Crazy Inventions Go Haywire!
programme.desc: Mom's inventions are going haywire! The smart house has a tantrum & a time machine creates a pterodactyl!

programme.title: JJ's Fun Learning Fundamentals!
programme.desc: JJ learns the fundamentals! He counts baby chicks with Grandpa, learns shapes & mixes colors with jello!

programme.title: Let's Go Outside & Play with JJ!
programme.desc: Let's go outside & play with JJ! He builds a pillow fort, goes camping & has a scavenger hunt at the beach!

programme.title: JJ's Splashin' Jungle Jams!
programme.desc: JJ's having a splashin' dance party! He plays freeze dance at the beach & learns his ABCs under the sea!

programme.title: Orphle & Winston's Worst Ideas Ever!
programme.desc: Orphle & Winston have the worst ideas ever! They multiply Orphle & turn Winston into a rat by mistake!

programme.title: Tiny Heroes, Giant-Sized Adventures!
programme.desc: Mila & Morphle are tiny heroes on giant adventures! They rescue a hamster from a maze & save a shrunken whale!

programme.title: Spelunking, Bending & Horses!
programme.desc: Rob & his friends are learning new skills! Rob shows off his spelunking skills & TK learns to ride a horse!

programme.title: Treasure, Cheese & A Mystery!
programme.desc: Rob & his friends are solving mysteries! They hunt for ancient treasure & solve the riddle of a blank book!

programme.title: A Day of Food, Play & Learning!
programme.desc: It's a day of food, play & learning! The kids have a teddy bear picnic & learn to say hello with a wave!

programme.title: Sweet Dreams & Goodnight Songs!
programme.desc: It's time for sweet dreams! Mia plays "Ten in a Bed," takes a bubble bath & goes on a rocket ride to the moon!

programme.title: Learning to Do the Right Thing!
programme.desc: Buster learns to do the right thing! He learns that telling the truth is best & helps save a runaway train!

programme.title: Learning How to Be a Good Friend!
programme.desc: Buster learns to be a good friend! He welcomes a new, shy student & learns it's not okay to cheat in a game!

programme.title: Gecko vs Weasel: Ultimate Rivalry
programme.desc: It's Gecko vs. Weasel! They have a car wash competition & Weasel tries to steal the plans for the Mechanicals!

programme.title: A Big Test of Skill & Teamwork!
programme.desc: It's a test of skill & teamwork! The Mechanicals fix Fiona on their own & Gecko's team wins a football game!

programme.title: Let's All Help Each Other!
programme.desc: Let's all help each other on the farm! The friends build a bird feeder, cheer up a sad horse & share veggies!

programme.title: Healthy Habits & Happy You!
programme.desc: Learn healthy habits on the farm! Ella learns to wash her hands, eat veggies & how to recycle!

programme.title: Magic, A Blob, A Show & A Bubble!
programme.desc: It's a bubbly day of fun! Bubbles invents a bouncy blob that goes out of control & spoils Pogo's magic show!

programme.title: Fruits, Cupcakes, Snacks & Ice Cream!
programme.desc: The Minibods are hungry! Pogo waits for a fruit to ripen & Lulu's cupcake mix turns into a giant blob!

programme.title: JJ's Nature Walk & Favorite Rhymes!
programme.desc: JJ goes on a nature walk! He learns to help the Earth & sings nursery rhymes like "Ten in the Bed"!

She then brings Dong Sheng onto the show, where Mei Qi exposes his infidelity and reveals the conspiracy behind her death.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husband’s affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a “stranger” who claims to also be a victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit? As she struggles to control her thoughts and actions, can she stop herself from hurting those around her?

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady
programme.desc: Beautiful Alice has a successful career but is in love with a married man, thus becoming very lonely. She can only find companionship in her cleaning lady Shelly, a mysterious girl whose face is scarred by burns. As they become closer, Alice accidentally discovers Shelly's dark history and is soon embroiled in a horrific act of revenge.

programme.title: Hollow
programme.desc: Beth, an old woman with early signs of Alzheimer’s disease, moves in to a new house with her daughter’s family. Despite her loss of reality and worsening symptoms, Beth uncovers something sinister observing her every move. A dark and horrific confrontation is about to begin…

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A thief with a knife and a big idea meets a store employee and his bigger blade; a ride share driver has his evening shattered as gunfire rips through his truck.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: DNA Speaks
programme.desc: When jewellery seller Minerva Cantu, 26, is found bound, gagged and lifeless in her home, police suspect robbery as the motive.

programme.title: Cold Case Files (S3)
programme.desc: Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A suspect loses his cool in the interrogation room; a man with a shocking gunshot wound leaves police with more questions than answers; a game of hide and seek turns deadly; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A model is questioned about a deadly encounter with her boyfriend; a man makes a cold-blooded confession; a person of interest says too much; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A grieving father attacks his 3-year-old son's killer in court; a judge screams expletives at a disruptive member of the gallery; a wheelchair-ridden defendant runs for it before entering court; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A defendant announces college baseball scores during his murder trial; a man facing drug charges gets caught smoking marijuana in the virtual courtroom; a domestic violence suspect threatens a judge.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: A man living at an extended-stay hotel is shot dead in his room after a night of gambling with friends turns into more than anyone bargained for.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24)
programme.desc: In Mobile, a 70-year-old Vietnam vet is found beaten to death in his home where detectives discover threatening letters. In New Orleans, Detective Amy Robinson works the case of a man shot behind a store.

programme.title: Homicide Squad New Orleans (S2)
programme.desc: Nick Davis investigates a local artist found murdered in his home. With very little evidence, Detective Davis methodically pursues every lead until a lucky break points him toward a surprise suspect.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: A day out on the river with friends ends in a deadly encounter when a man stabs five people with a pocket knife, following a terrifying confrontation.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S5)
programme.desc: When a mother learns her daughter has been abused by the teenager's estranged father, the police are called. But, before the investigation can gather speed, the father visits unexpectedly.

programme.title: Preschool | Eccd
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Grade 1 Language
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang konsepto ng pagbabaybay, panghalip, pangngalan, salitang naglalarawan, at ang pagtukoy ng sariling ideya at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggang kuwento.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: Know more about fractions 1⁄2 and 1/4, 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional figures, as well as continuous and repeating patterns and mathematical sentences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Reading & Literacy
programme.desc: Learn about polite expressions and how to talk about oneself, one’s family and one’s personal experiences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Makabansa
programme.desc: Unawain ang kahalagahan ng pagkilala ng mga batayang impormasyon ng pisikal na kapaligiran sa sariling paaralan at ng mga taong bumubuo rito para sa paghubog ng kakayahan ng bawat mag-aaral.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, salitang magkatugma, salitang naglalarawan, at pagbabaybay, pati na rin ang iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento at ang pag-uugnay ng sarili sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: Study how to divide whole numbers up to 1000 including money and unit fractions. Learn more about straight and curved lines, flat and curved surfaces, and basic shapes and continuous patterns using two attributes.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: Discover what are word clines, synonyms, and antonyms. Identify major points and key themes in a story, and the difference between what is made-up and real in texts.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin ang kahalagahan ng mabuting paglilingkod ng mga namumuno sa pagsulong ng mga pangunahing hanapbuhay at pagtugon sa pangangailangan ng mga kasapi ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang tambalang salita, pandiwa, pang-abay, at pang-ukol. Alamin kung paano magbigay ng sariling ideya, hinuha, pangunahin at sumusuportang kaisipan, tungkol sa kuwentong napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: Identify which fractions are proper and improper, similar and dissimilar and equivalent. Learn more about lines and symmetrical designs, continuous and repeating patterns, and mathematical sentences involving multiplication and division of whole numbers.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: Study what are homonyms, homographs, and hyponyms. Know more about the elements of a story, how to write it, and how to compare and contrast its information, alongside learning about words, phrases, and sentences with long vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Unawain at pahalagahan ang pagkakakilanlang kultural ng kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: Discover how objects perform motion, and learn about the source of light, sound, heat and electricity, along with their uses.

programme.title: Grade 9 Filipino
programme.desc: Suriin ang iba't ibang uri ng panitikan tulad ng parabula, elehiya, at alamat, at ang pinagmulan ng mga salita at pag-uugnay ng sariling karanasan sa mga tekstong binasa.

programme.title: Grade 9 Math
programme.desc: Discover the key concepts of parallelograms and triangle similarity.

programme.title: Grade 9 English
programme.desc: Learn the difference of biases from prejudice and the relevance and validity of information presented.

programme.title: Grade 9 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang mga pangunahing kaalaman tungkol sa pambansang ekonomiya bilang kabahagi sa pagpapabuti ng pamumuhay ng kapwa mamamayan tungo sa pambansang kaunlaran.

programme.title: Grade 9 Science
programme.desc: Know more about the volcanoes found in the Philippines, the factors that affect climate, the effects of changing climate, and how to adapt accordingly. Discover the relationship between the constellations in the sky and Earth's position along its orbit.

programme.title: Als
programme.desc: Learn about the process of planning, setting up, running a small business, and entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano wastong gamitin ang mga pang-abay, pang-uri, pang-angkop, pangatnig, salitang naglalarawan. Aralin kung paano magsulat ng pangungusap, talata, at balita, at kung paano magsuri ng mga kuwento at mga pahayag.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: Learn about parallel and perpendicular lines, angles, triangles, quadrilaterals, continuous and repeating patterns and number sentences, and the concept of time, perimeter, area, and volume.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: Learn what are adverbs, signal words, and graphic organizers, and how to analyze a story and infer the speaker's tone, mood and purpose.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Unawain ang bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan sa lipunan, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng bansa.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: Know more about forces that change the shape, size or movement of objects and how light, heat and sound travel using various media.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: Know more about forces that change the shape, size or movement of objects and how light, heat and sound travel using various media.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin ang iba't ibang uri ng panitikan at kung paano sulatin at suriin ang mga ito. Pag-aralan paggamit ng wastong mga pahayag at angkop na mga salita sa pagsusulat ng reaksiyon sa mga teksto at napanood na video.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: Identify the key concepts of combinatorics and probability.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: Learn about the different techniques in writing, how to compose and critique it.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin ang mga malikhaing hakbang na nagsusulong ng pagtanggap at paggalang sa iba’t ibang kasarian upang maitaguyod ang pagkakapantay- pantay ng tao bilang kasapi ng pamayanan.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: Learn about the feedback mechanisms of organisms and how it helps them maintain homeostasis. Discover how information is stored in DNA, how changes in its molecule affect its products as mutations, and how evolution through natural selection can result in biodiversity, whose influence can affect the stability of ecosystems.

programme.title: Preschool | Eccd
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: Les Grandes Grandes Vacances
programme.desc: July 1942. Vichy France obliges all Jews to wear a yellow star. Ernest and Colette are shocked to see how their friend Rosalie is treated at school, now that she has to wear the star. They are horrified and also want to find a way to resist.

programme.title: L'Avenir Nous Appartient
programme.desc: Janette Bertrand rehabilitates old age; ''plogging'' or how to clear litter from the streets whilst doing your daily jog; an internet platform for second-hand clothes to fight back against ''fast fashion''; a farm that helps men in distress.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Temps Present
programme.desc: 'Temps Present'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes
programme.desc: From Saint-Paul-de-Vence to the Roya Valley, in the hinterland of Nice, enthusiasts are fighting to promote their territory. By reviving an old perfume house or creating a high-end spirit with small spelt, these artisans are committed to preserving their precious heritage.

programme.title: echappees Belles
programme.desc: With its mountainous relief in the east and desert in the west, Colorado is a mosaic of national parks. A playground for hikers, this land of mountains, deep red canyons, mesas, sandy dunes and crystal-clear lakes was first the site of many military conquests.

programme.title: 20H30 Le Dimanche
programme.desc: Film, music, sport, literature, politics... Laurent Delahousse's guests talk about themselves and their lives, their careers and their projects, and discuss the news making the headlines of the day. The programme closes with a live musical performance.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: To move forward with the investigation into the attempted murder of Commissioner Watson, Bellerose comes up with a risky idea. Taking advantage of a prisoner transfer, he tries to discreetly question Delporte, a corrupt cop.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: The operation turns into a nightmare when Delporte escapes and a prison officer is killed. Bellerose is held fully responsible for the fiasco.

programme.title: La Vigne En Heritage
programme.desc: Behind the scenes at Château Haut-Brion, father of all the great Bordeaux wines, in the municipality of Pessac. It falls within the Pessac-Leognan appellation, in the northern area of the Bordeaux Graves winegrowing region. It's also the oldest wine estate in the region...

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: 64' Debat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. Increased focus on Francophone cultural news, with dedicated sequences. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Temps Present
programme.desc: 'Temps Present'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Fleeing Kabul aged 6, Hamida Aman grew up in Lausanne, where she learnt journalism. After September 11th, she went back to Afghanistan and created the 'Begum Organization for Women', then Radio Begum, presented by and for women. Faced with Taliban censorship, she launched TV Begum in France.

programme.title: Gotha
programme.desc: A general overview of European and world monarchies, through an issue of the moment, a particular focus, an encounter or a trend, plus one right royal question, asked by Ange-Victoria!

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'Actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: 64' Debat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. Increased focus on Francophone cultural news, with dedicated sequences. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: C Dans L'Air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Comment Ca Va Le Nord ?
programme.desc: In Old Crow, how are Chief Dana Tizya-Tramm and his Gwich'in community facing climate warming and what can the rest of the world learn from their initiatives?

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cedric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Le Goût Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Fleeing Kabul aged 6, Hamida Aman grew up in Lausanne, where she learnt journalism. After September 11th, she went back to Afghanistan and created the 'Begum Organization for Women', then Radio Begum, presented by and for women. Faced with Taliban censorship, she launched TV Begum in France.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Le Goût Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boite !
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Para sa Isa't Isa ep 21
programme.desc: Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Osyana ep 4
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 7
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: Beh Buti Nga ep 9
programme.desc: After making a fortune from Bitcoin, Axel gets back at the girls who once broke his heart. When he succeeds, he makes it a mission to help his high school barkada to become confident heartbreakers. However, things take a turn when Isabelle their only female friend in high school starts forming a bond with Axel and he falls in love with her for real.

programme.title: Kagat ng Dilim 2020 ep 8
programme.desc: REBOOT: Urban legends and urban horror stories set against a backdrop of modern-day events and headlines, terrifying tales told in mock-documentary style make up this groundbreaking original horror series.

programme.title: Minsan Pa Natin Hagkan ang Nakaraan ep 52
programme.desc: A woman who was severely broken by her greatest love finds love again in an older man who did everything to put her back together. Just when she thought her life is finally back to normal, her greatest love comes back, determined to work for her forgiveness and win her back—even if it means breaking her family apart

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 197
programme.desc: The series is based on the graphic novel created by Carlo J. Caparas. Totoy Bato, a young man, fighting for justice for his lost loved ones; also fighting for equality and fairness against his old friend turned nemesis Dwayne.

programme.title: Cuerpo Y Alma ep 2
